creator: sonam.chauhan@ce.com.au
text:
Currently thread groups can only occur directly under the 'Test Plan' element. 
Can thread groups be allowed to nest under other thread groups, just as any 
other sampler or listener? The subthread groups would contain other samplers 
or listeners. 

This is useful for multiple work threads which require additional parallel 
work be done at some point. An example is load testing a publish-subscribe EAI 
system: Multiple JMeter threads each 'publish' a document subscribed to by 
multiple 'target' systems. After publishing it's document, a test thread needs 
to start other threads which each do certain processing specific to different 
target systems to ensure all subscribing target systems received the document. 
For instance, different target system may have different propagation delays 
receiving the document, or specific target systems may discard record of the 
document after a given timeframe, etc.
